configurableConfig.description: When configured, passed-in paths are ignored.
configurableConfig.label: Path

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  ../.common/tag read '' "${recursive}" "${target_path}"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  ../.common/tag read '' "${recursive}" "${@}"
else
  echo "Without configuration, expected paths passed-in" >&2
  exit 1
fi
taskDescription: Returns tags of the passed-in path
